      • getWeaponImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getWeaponImage(java.lang.String name)
        Method for getting a weapon Image
        Parameters:
        name - weapon's name (as in the WeaponsAssetsDictionary.json)
        Returns:
        the Image of the weapon with the specified name

      • getPowerupImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getPowerupImage(java.lang.String name,
                                                Colors color)
        Method for getting a powerup Image
        Parameters:
        name - powerup's name (as in the PowerupsAssetsDictionary.json)
        color - color of the wanted powerup
        Returns:
        the Image of the powerup with the specified name and color

      • getWeaponType

        public java.lang.Integer getWeaponType(java.lang.String name)
        Method for getting the type of a weapon (needed for the SelectEffectController). The type of a weapon defines how the player can select the effects.
        Parameters:
        name - weapon's name as in the WeaponsTypesDictionary.json
        Returns:
        Integer of the weapon's type

      • setUnavailable

        public static void setUnavailable(javafx.scene.image.ImageView card,
                                  boolean unloaded)
        Applies an effect to an imageView depending on the boolean unloaded
        Parameters:
        card - imageView to which is going to be applied the effect
        unloaded - if true the opacity of the imageView is going to be 0.4, if false is going to be 1.0.
